content: materials - 1 skein of purl soho s nigh dk 1 100% cashmere each skein is 199 yards/ 55 grams approximately 199 total yards required we used heirloom white nickel gray raindrop blue morning sky and harbor blue - us 4 3 5 mm 16-inch circular needles 2 - a stitch marker 3 gauge 28 stitches and 37 rounds = 4 inches in stitch pattern note we used almost the entire skein for this cowl to avoid running out of yarn be sparing with your tails and check your gauge be sure to block your swatch too… after all cashmere does tend to relax size finished dimensions approximately 18 inches circumference x 9½ inches tall designed by purl soho designer laura ferguson 4 1 https //www purlsoho com/nigh html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=964 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/laura-ferguson-for-purl-soho/
